abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Lifestealer enters a maddened rage, becoming magically immune and gaining increased attack speed.
abilities.notes: Provides spell immunity (dispels all debuffs on cast) and magic resistance.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Wounds an enemy unit, slowing its movement speed and allowing all allied units that attack the target to heal themselves for a percentage of the damage they deal.
abilities.notes: Applies a slow and allows allies to lifesteal from the target. Can be removed by dispels.

abilities.name: Ghoul Frenzy
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks slow enemies and grant him bonus movement and attack speed.
abilities.notes: Lifestealer gains movement and attack speed while slowing enemy movement and attack speed with his attacks.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description: Lifestealer infests an allied unit, hiding inside it to regenerate health. He can exit the infested unit at any time, consuming it for health if it's a creep.
abilities.notes: Lifestealer becomes invulnerable while inside an infested unit. Cannot infest ancient creeps or Roshan without specific upgrades.

innate_abilities.name: Feast
innate_abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal additional damage and heal him based on the target's current health. Killing units grants permanent max health bonuses.
innate_abilities.notes: Each attack deals bonus damage and heals Lifestealer based on the target's maximum health. Permanent health bonuses are granted when killing units.
